compatibility.notes: The Parity-7.0.0 license requires that any derivative works or combined works must also be licensed under the same terms, ensuring strong copyleft compliance.

key_requirements: Include the text of this license with any distribution.
Contribute changes or additions to the software if used beyond thirty days or shared outside the team.
Do not change the license terms for this software.

obligations: Share software that builds on this software alike.
